Produce summary table of completeness and validity for variables in a dataframe

Get the dataframe names of columns which are all NA

Calculate time differences from 2 columns in a dataframe with various outputs

Organize and access validation rules from a list of class `validRules`

Apply validation rule from a list of rules to a column based on column name
validateDF()
Apply validateColumn and validRUles across a dataframe
